title: Projects
text:
Tools: PySpark, Pandas, Quarto, Plotly
Developed interactive visualizations analyzing job market salary distributions using Lightcast job postings data.
Explored relationships between experience level, education, and industry type to uncover patterns in remote and onsite employment.
- Created automated dashboards with Python and Quarto.
- Applied Spark SQL for large-scale data processing.
- Designed visual storytelling for executive reporting.




Tools: Excel, Tableau
Performed a comprehensive startup market assessment as part of the Startup Innovation course.
Evaluated market positioning, financial sustainability, and customer segments for early-stage businesses.
Delivered a data-driven strategy presentation using visualization tools to demonstrate business viability.

title: Haocun Wang
text:
title: ‚ÄúHaocun Wang‚Äù format: html: theme: cerulean toc: true ‚Äî

Welcome
Hello! I‚Äôm Haocun Wang, a graduate student at Boston University pursuing a Master of Science in Applied Business Analytics.
With a solid foundation in finance from Weber State University and a growing expertise in data analytics, strategic management, and business intelligence, I am passionate about leveraging data-driven insights to support smart business decisions.
This website serves as my professional portfolio, showcasing my academic work, projects, and experience.
Please explore the tabs above to learn more about me, view my work, and connect professionally.

title: About Me
text:
About Me
I‚Äôm Haocun Wang, a data-driven professional passionate about the intersection of finance, analytics, and innovation.
Currently pursuing my Master‚Äôs in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University, I am focused on developing strong analytical and programming skills to support business intelligence and data visualization for real-world decision-making.
I earned my Bachelor of Science in Finance from Weber State University, where I built a strong foundation in microeconomics, strategic management, financial institutions, and supply chain operations.
My academic and professional journey has shaped me into a curious problem solver who enjoys uncovering insights hidden within data.
In my free time, I enjoy exploring machine learning applications, startup innovation, and emerging business technologies.
My long-term goal is to become a Business or Data Analyst specializing in strategic analytics for financial and technology sectors.


üéØ Career Goals

Build expertise in data analytics and business intelligence tools (Python, PySpark, Tableau, SQL).

Work in industries where data science meets business strategy, such as finance, consulting, or tech.

Continue developing leadership, communication, and cross-functional project skills.
